1.name: Kihow
1.detail: KiHow is an entrepreneur who introduced 3D printing technology to the Cambodian market. His years of experience range from designing hundreds of printable 3D models to maintaining, assembling, and repairing a wide range of 3D printers. His development of 3D printing and design curriculums allowed several Cambodian schools and NGO's to integrate new innovative subjects to their learning strategies.
